name: Putter Home
description:
Send cutie to her home by whacking her with a putter! Made in 22 hours for Global Game Jam 2019.

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/putter-home

Controls:

  • Pick up the putter with your mouse by clicking and dragging it.
  • Hold the right mouse button to rotate the putter
  • If your putter disappears and you can't find it, press spacebar
  • If something totally messes up, you can restart the level by pressing escape
